Title: HP EliteBook Ultra G1i Review: A Laptop That’s All Business
Description: HP’s no-nonsense EliteBook Ultra G1i is a buttoned-up laptop that’s priced accordingly.

Title: I tried the magnetic mouse with its own folding USB-C charge cable

Title: Trump administration tries to ramp up deportations. And, a look at Canada's election
Description:
Critics say the Trump administration is making mistakes as it tries to drive up deportation numbers.
And, Canada's election for the next prime minister is heavily influenced by Trump.

Title: Wall Street is changing. See the firms young people want to work for today.
Description: In our survey, Goldman Sachs and JPMorgan stood out in popularity — but so did Centerview Partners and the alternative asset managers .

Title: Meet the Silicon Valley college dropouts throwing their own graduation
Description:
From Gates to Zuckerberg, dropping out of college is a badge of honor in Silicon Valley.
Now, it's cause for celebration, too.

Title: 'Godfather of AI' says he's 'glad' to be 77 because the tech probably won't take over the world in his lifetime
Description: Geoffrey Hinton estimated a "sort of 10 to 20% chance" that AI systems could one day seize control, but stressed it's impossible to predict exactly.

Title: '25 is the new 21': Gen Z is taking the slow road to adulthood
Description: Gen Z is intentionally delaying major life milestones like buying a home, getting a job, and getting married.

Title: How America loses its edge
Description:
Trump's funding cuts at universities are jeopardizing his "America First" mission.
The US, a leader in Nobel prizes, could start to slip.

Title: How America Became Afraid of the Other
Description: "Punishing assorted others quells empathy and dissent, for we do not want to be targeted ourselves," writes Viet Thanh Nguyễn.

Title: Letters from Our Readers
Description: Readers respond to Jennifer Wilson’s piece about housing insecurity, Jill Lepore’s essay on Ruth Stout, and Helen Shaw’s review of “Ghosts.”

Title: Cinema was Claude Lelouch’s Nanny
Description:
The eighty-seven-year-old French director, in town for a rerelease of “A Man and a Woman,” his swinging-sixties “make-out movie,” ponders what he believes will be his final film.
Bruce Handy reports.

Title: Jeremy Jordan Mines “Floyd Collins” for Its Sonic Gems
Description: Helen Shaw reviews Adam Guettel and Tina Landau’s 1996 musical about a trapped caver on Broadway, and Shayok Misha Chowdhury’s “Rheology” and Mona Pirnot’s “I’m Assuming You Know David Greenspan” Off Off Broadway.

Title: National Archives Releases Unidentified Anomalous Phenomena (UAP) Records
Description:
The National Archives and Records Administration (NARA) today released new records related to Unidentified Anomalous Phenomena (UAP).

Title: East German Stasi Tactics – Zersetzung (2021)
Description: A look at the experiences of activists in East Germany (GDR) dealing with Stasi informants and infiltration before the fall of the Berlin Wall in 1989.

Description: From 'The Apprentice' to the White House, Donald Trump is using the skills he honed as a TV reality star and applying them to the presidency.
